title: Social Media Content Creator
job_overview:
Key Responsibilities
Produce original, high-quality short-form video content for TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, etc.
Showcase ELSPet products (especially our self-cleaning litter box) through real-life usage and storytelling with your cat(s)
Stay up to date with viral trends, Upgrade to see actual infos, and TikTok formats—and creatively adapt them to our brand
Create content that’s not only promotional but entertaining, authentic, and highly relatable
Work with the marketing team to align on messaging, video direction, and campaign goals
Help identify and engage with pet influencers for collaboration opportunities

Requirements
Must currently own a cat or have hands-on experience caring for cats
Avid TikTok user with a natural eye for trending formats, audios, and Upgrade to see actual infos
Strong on-camera presence and ability to deliver authentic storytelling
Skilled in short-form video editing (in-app or using tools like CapCut, VN, etc.)
Experience creating for TikTok, Instagram Reels, or Facebook Shorts
Experience or interest in influencer outreach is a plus
Existing personal or pet-related social media account with engagement is highly preferred
